prompts.text: Rank players by height (tallest to shortest)
prompts.description: Order players from tallest to shortest based on their physical height

prompts.text: Rank players by how likely they are to become famous
prompts.description: Who is most likely to achieve fame or celebrity status?

prompts.text: Most likely to survive a zombie apocalypse
prompts.description: Who would last longest in a zombie outbreak scenario?

prompts.text: Most likely to become a billionaire
prompts.description: Who has the highest chance of accumulating massive wealth?

prompts.text: Best cooking skills (best to worst chef)
prompts.description: Rank players by their culinary abilities and cooking talent

prompts.text: Brings the most energy to a party
prompts.description: Who gets everyone excited and keeps the party going?

prompts.text: Most adventurous and willing to try new things
prompts.description: Who is most likely to say yes to spontaneous adventures?

prompts.text: Most likely to binge-watch an entire Netflix series in one day
prompts.description: Who has the dedication to marathon through TV shows?

prompts.text: Best fashion sense and style
prompts.description: Who consistently looks the most put-together and stylish?

prompts.text: Biggest morning person (loves waking up early)
prompts.description: Who is most energetic and happy in the early hours?

prompts.text: Most likely to procrastinate until the last minute
prompts.description: Who consistently leaves things until the deadline approaches?

prompts.text: Most confident at karaoke night
prompts.description: Who takes the mic first and performs with the most enthusiasm?

prompts.text: Most tech-savvy and good with gadgets
prompts.description: Who do you call when your devices aren't working?

prompts.text: Best at keeping plants alive
prompts.description: Who has the greenest thumb and nurturing abilities?

prompts.text: Best road trip navigator and planner
prompts.description: Who would you trust to plan and guide a cross-country adventure?

prompts.text: Most likely to go viral on social media
prompts.description: Who has the content creation skills to become internet famous?

prompts.text: Best memory and never forgets anything
prompts.description: Who remembers birthdays, appointments, and random facts?

prompts.text: Most optimistic and positive outlook
prompts.description: Who always looks on the bright side of situations?

prompts.text: Most competitive in games and sports
prompts.description: Who hates losing and always plays to win?

prompts.text: Most likely to eat dessert before dinner
prompts.description: Who has the least self-control around sweets?
